articles.title: Dates for ICC T20 World Cup 2024 out, IPL to shift to new window - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Unlike the previous tournament, held during the October - November window, the upcoming 2024 edition is likely to take place from June 4- 30.
articles.content: On Saturday, July 29, reports surfaced online that the ICC has given the green light to the USA and West Indies to host the 2024 T20 World Cup after a recent inspection. Unlike the previous tournamen… [+1033 chars]
